Steve, great site and compelling evp's. It's wonderful to find other dedicated researchers who actively pursue recording messages from the non-physicals. BTW, your DVD shipped this weekend so you'll have it shortly, USPO tracking # 0307 0020 004 2862 5698.
   
  Thanks, Bill

Steve Hultay <urkel23@...> wrote:
          I have a new web site i'd like people to check out. It is dedicated 
to the work of Frank and of all the possibilities the box may hold. 
The link is www.keyportparanormal.com

Thanx,
-Steve
